attributes.additional_details:
Digitally-capture living-fingerprints [ideally head-&-shoulders JPEG, signature too] & transaction details at-counter both cash-&-card [including rejected-attempts].

Less-secure modern-laptops incorporate webcam & fingerprint-reader; ideally-suited-to remote client-ID.

Primarily aimed-at linking pre-payment cell-phone credits to-an-individual & by-definition date-& timed-stamped telephone-number’s called with-location’s [& person’s-of-interest].

Stolen-&-unregistered cell-phone’s utilise established networked secure-encrypted-server’s; disposable SIM-cards backed-up-with unique Electronic Serial-Number [ESN] afford track-&-trace abilities for security-services.

Requiring retailer's keep proper-record's critical-to preventing crime-&-misuse.
